ActJudges Act
SubjectLeave of Absence to the Hon. André F.J. Scott
PrecisGranting of a leave of absence to the Hon. ANDRÉ F.J. SCOTT, a Judge of the Federal Court of Appeal, from March 2 to September 2, 2018, on account of ill-health.
AttachmentsAttachment
